API key for Google Map is not required but by providing API key, you are able to:
- Manage your Map statistics.
- By default, without API or free API, it would limit you 25,000 map loads per day. (Reference: https://developers.google.com/maps/faq?csw=1#usagelimits). If your usage reaches this limit. You could pay for more by using API Key.

You could get a API Key at: https://code.google.com/apis/console

Note: Please make sure that you provide a valid API Key or leave it empty.

Due to Memory Issue, XenForo was limited image size to 16MP to be resized (Configurable via config.php since XenForo 1.1.5 but we keep use separated settings). This is to make sure XF would work on almost hosts. But that means it is limiting you from processing high resolution photos that for example: 3.39MB size but 3744x5616 = 21MP.

You might specify here an custom number of pixel to serve your members to be able to upload larger files, higher resolution.

NOTE: Please make sure that you adjusted memory_limit option in php.ini to make it works or you would get Out of Memory on uploading of large files.

NOTE: It is recommended you to leave this setting alone if you are using shared host or even VPS for better perfomance.

Reference: http://php.net/memory-limit

Background color for the watermark text. It could be the Hex color code like: #FFF, #000. If you want a transparent background, just enter: transparent.

The background color is not valid. It must be the Hex color code or transparent.
Eg:
- #000
- #CECECE
- transparent
Path to your font (TTF font) to use for text rendering. Leave empty to use default font by XenGallery (Arial).
The font path is invalid. This must be the path to your font file (usally TTF). Leave empty to use default font.

The watermark image is invalid. It should be an URL, a relative path to XenForo's root or a absolute path.
Eg:
- http://example.com/watermark.png
- styles/watermark.png
- /home/domain.com/styles/watermark.png.
An URL or path to an image on your server.
Margin between watermark and the photo's borders.

property.description: Disable Auto Scroll functionality when user scroll to the bottom and show Page Navigation.

property.title: Grid Item - Actions Item Text - Hover
Show User Page instead of User Card
property.description: When click on username's link, it normally shows User Card. Check this option if you want to redirect to user's gallery page instead.

property.title: Enable Overlay
property.description: Enable Overlay View for albums and photos

property.title: Disable AJAX validation while creating album
property.description: In some cases, while creating an album users might upload several big photos and your servers take time to process them. This could make timeout if we use AJAX auto validation.

property.title: Trigger fullscreen if users open regular page directly

group.title: sonnb - XenGallery - Album/Photo View
group.description: Layout properties for Album view and Photo view
